title: Watch As This Chick Rage-Quits a Podcast Because A Dude Said Sleeping With a Trans (Sigh) 'Woman' is Gay
description:
Based flannel dude is back, and this time, he lost the flannel and brought an equally based friend. This show got so based that his triggered guests actually rage-quit in the middle. That's how you know it's seriously based.

The trouble began when a viewer sent a chat that asked, "Would you rather smash the hottest trans woman in the world or the oldest woman in the world?"

Chase, the only other male present besides the host, replied, "Honestly bro, the oldest woman in the world, because then I wouldn't be gay."

Uh-oh.

\u201cFull video of the RAGE QUIT and her STORMING off after he says he would NOT sleep with a transwoman.\u201d
— whatever (@whatever) 1677550279

This didn't sit well with Kiko, their 22-year-old bartender guest. She accused him of being transphobic and asked, "what the f**ck do you mean?"

Chase then calmly explained, "Because if I had sex with a trans woman, I'd be having sex with a biological man. And I don't want to do that." At this point, host Brian Atlas simply put his head in his hands. He knew what was coming.

Chase continued to explain that it would be gay for him, a biological man, to have sex with another biological man. But Kiko was not having it. She got up and left, as did the chick sitting next to her.

Kiko could be heard yelling off-camera, "For a biological woman, who doesn't even have any trans friends, that was too f*cking far." She then attacked him for being a Christian and called on him to "not judge."

Chase came back with the perfect counterargument: God created man and woman. And that is really at the heart of this whole transgenderism debacle. Humans are trying to do something God has already perfected by recreating the genders. And the results have been devastating.

Men, it's ok if you don't want to sleep with a biological man. It doesn't make you transphobic. It just makes you straight.

But actually, I guess in 2023, those are the same thing. C'est la vie.

title: WATCH: Mother Testifies About Losing Both Her Sons to Fentanyl And It's Absolutely Heartbreaking
description:
The House held a hearing today on the state of our southern border. Spoiler: it is bad. Essentially nonexistent, actually.

One of the most tragic results of the border crisis is America's subsequent fentanyl epidemic. At the hearing, Rebecca Kiessling gave emotional testimony about the impact of fentanyl on her and her loved ones. Kiessling lost both of her sons to fentanyl poisoning back in 2020. Twenty-year-old Caleb and Eighteen-year-old Kyler took "fake Percocet" in a hotel room along with a 17-year-old friend who also succumbed to the drug.

Kiessling explained that she didn't even know what fentanyl or Narcan was, and didn't know her sons were taking anything that could kill them. They didn't either, she said - but the government knew.

\u201cHEART BREAKING: Mother who lost 2 of her sons to fentanyl testifies at border hearing\u201d
— The Post Millennial (@The Post Millennial) 1677606267

"If we had Chinese troops lining up along our southern border with weapons aimed at our people, with weapons of mass destruction aimed at our cities, you damn well know you would do something about it. We have a weather balloon from China going across our country. Nobody died, and everybody’s freaking out about it. But 100,000 die every year, and nothing’s being done. Not enough is being done, numbers are going up, not down, and you talk about children being taken away from their parents. My children were taken away from me."

This epidemic really is the equivalent of a foreign attack. Chemical precursors for fentanyl are actually shipped from China to Mexico, where they are manufactured into the opioid and trafficked across the border by cartels. The result? According to Families Against Fentanyl, fentanyl poisoning is the leading cause of death for Americans ages 18-45.

Countries securing their own borders shouldn't even be a debate in 2023, but here we are. And at a certain point, the United States government has to decide if it wants to protect its own people or not. Might I suggest a big, beautiful wall?

title: Watch: Awesome 9-year-old girl wrecks her woke school board for lying about 'no politics in schools'
description:
Back in the day, I wrote a letter to the dean of my school complaining about regulating how long boys' hair was allowed to be. It was during my metalhead phase. My dad yelled at me for speaking out and not just shutting up. Thankfully for this 9-year-old patriot, her parents are more supportive of her speaking out against injustices. "Based Bethany" takes issue with the political propaganda placed in the hallway as she navigates the third grade.

But there's a twist! She already addressed the school board and was told that there were to be no political posters on the walls of her school. Including that of a certain bitterly partisan political organization that claims some lives matter. When B.B. went to the principal, she was told the school board was the one who put the posters up. B.B. was pissed, to put it mildly.

This based 9-year-old came for all the smoke when she called out her woke school board. pic.twitter.com/Q0bRAQTc7t
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) February 28, 2023

"There should be no BLM in schools, period. It does not matter the color you make the posters or the fonts you use. We all understand the meaning. It is a political message about getting rid of police officers, rioting, burning buildings down while King Governor Walz ..."

OK, it looks like we're in Minnesota. Maybe she knows this kid.

"... just sits on his throne and watches. We all know. Changing the font or the color of posters does not change the meaning. I am NINE YEARS OLD and I know that."

"But Brodigan, isn't it wrong to exploit children for politics?"

But fictional progressive asking a theoretical question, you get your science from a Swedish teenager and make high schoolers the face of your gun-grabbing agenda. No one is launching a political movement around her. We're just enjoying a viral video and admiring a kid's courage to speak out against a progressive narrative.

It shouldn't take courage to believe you shouldn't be exposed to government propaganda while you're learning your multiplication tables. But it's a public school in a blue state. The school board members probably wrote her name in the Burn Book after she finished yelling at them. CNN has probably sent reporters to sneak into her home and count her Barbies to see how many of each ethnicity she has.

It would be nice if kids didn't have to worry about things like this. Back in a bygone era of a few years ago, they didn't have to. They just had to worry about going to school. But grown-ass leftist "adults" have decided to turn schools into indoctrination camps. The kids have a right to speak out against it.

Editor’s Note

title: Watch: Trans Child Celebrity Admits They Never Feel Like Themselves Despite Gender-Confirming Surgeries
description:
If you aren't aware, Jazz Jennings is currently 22 years old and began their gender transition at age five. Yes, five. That's when Jazz was diagnosed with gender dysphoria. At age six, Jazz and their family started making television appearances about the struggles that come with being a transgender child.

Jazz's documentary-style TV show "I Am Jazz: A Family in Transition," premiered in 2011, and Jazz's fame skyrocketed from there. Jazz has undergone hormone therapy since they were eleven, and received male-to-female bottom surgery when they were 17 years old. Although, maybe that's a misprint, since minors never get gender transition surgery in America. That's just a transphobic conspiracy theory.

Despite all of these gender-confirming procedures, including three total surgeries due to complications, Jazz recently told their mother Jeanette that they never feel like themselves.

Jazz said through tears, "You know I can't get out of my head. It doesn't stop." Jeanette tried to console Jazz, saying "you're your own worst enemy."

Jazz continued, "I just want to feel like myself. All I want is to be happy and feel like me, and I don't feel like me ever."

\u201cThe mother of #IAmJazz gaslighting Jazz and saying jazz is their own worst enemy\n\nJazz says they don\u2019t feel like themselves - nothing has changed - even though they\u2019ve transitioned - their inner feelings is exactly the same as it did before \n\n\ud83d\ude33\u201d
— Seren Jones \ud83c\udff4\udb40\udc67\udb40\udc62\udb40\udc77\udb40\udc6c\udb40\udc73\udb40\udc7f\ud83e\udd95\ud83e\udd96 (@Seren Jones \ud83c\udff4\udb40\udc67\udb40\udc62\udb40\udc77\udb40\udc6c\udb40\udc73\udb40\udc7f\ud83e\udd95\ud83e\udd96) 1677484724

So after 17 years of gender affirmation, hormone therapy, and three surgeries, Jazz still does not feel like themselves. How many other transgender children feel like this that we don't know about?

And it gets worse. In another recent episode, a friend of Jazz's (who also happens to be transgender) said they might dabble in "frisky online modeling" to raise money for a breast augmentation surgery. Incredibly, Jazz's mother approved and said she has a lot of respect for the decision: "I think there are a lot of men, maybe women, that are super attracted to women that have not had bottom surgery. That’s their thing. People have fetishes. I went out with a toe sucker.”

I don't think I have to tell you how incredibly heartbreaking and infuriating it is to watch a mother control and gaslight their own child for years. On the bright side, the tide seems to be slowly turning on medically transitioning minors. Let's hope it keeps turning.

title: Leftists use Jessa Duggar's miscarriage to push pro-abortion propaganda until she drops them with the facts
description:
Since Roe vs. Wade was overturned, there has unsurprisingly been a lot of fear-mongering and misinformation from the left. One of the most common pro-abortion propaganda claims is that a miscarriage is actually an abortion. Which is of course not true at all, and downright insulting to women who have tragically suffered miscarriages.

One such woman is former reality TV star Jessa Duggar. Duggar told the story of her miscarriage on her YouTube channel last week. Leftist media quickly picked up the story and claimed she had an abortion, trying to twist the story into an ad for abortion "rights".

Writer and activist Josie Duffy Rice tweeted, "To be clear this is a member of one of the most famous vocally anti-abortion families……admitting she got an abortion……"

\u201cTo be clear this is a member of one of the most famous vocally anti-abortion families\u2026\u2026admitting she got an abortion\u2026\u2026 https://t.co/ia3WrqMZj1\u201d
— josie duffy rice (@josie duffy rice) 1677371744

Jezebel's headline read, "Jessa Duggar Seewald Had an Abortion, Even If She Won't Say the Word". And Parade reads, "Jessa Duggar Details Life-Saving Abortion in Emotional Video".

\u201cJessa Duggar Seewald Had an Abortion, Even If She Won't Say the Word https://t.co/3I4q6y1LiW\u201d
— Jezebel (@Jezebel) 1677522244
\u201cJessa Duggar Seewald opened up about a life-saving medical procedure in an emotional video. #JessaDuggar #JessaDuggarSeewald\nhttps://t.co/KYukQxuJvH\u201d
— Parade Mag (@Parade Mag) 1677526446

These attacks against a mourning mother are unbelievably disgusting. Luckily, Jessa didn't shy away from the fight. She hit back on her Instagram story, writing, "Women have D&Cs for many reasons, not all of which involve killing a live human being. The ultrasound revealed that I had a missed miscarriage. My baby’s heart had stopped beating 3 weeks before I had a D&C. There’s a world of difference between someone dying and someone being killed. To equate one to the other — and to a mother grieving the loss of her baby no less — is severely distasteful."

She concluded, "There is a world of difference between a mortician and a murderer. Even a child understands the difference between the two."

\u201cJessa Duggar sets the record straight after online leftists claimed her tragic miscarriage was an abortion. \n\n\u201cThere is a world of difference between a mortician and a murderer.\u201d\u201d
— Sarah Weaver (@Sarah Weaver) 1677535022

It is shocking how many leftists equate abortion and miscarriage simply because the same procedure is used to remove the child from the woman's uterus. This narrative completely divorces the intent of the procedure from the outcome. In abortion, the intent is to kill the child. Treatment for a miscarriage prevents a life-threatening infection and removes an already deceased child. And no pro-life laws prevent women from receiving treatment for a miscarriage. That would be medical malpractice.

Good for Jessa for speaking out. Hopefully, this will help more people see through the disgusting pro-abortion propaganda.

title: Love It: David Hogg's latest derptastic anti-gun tweet got smacked with a fact check
description:
Poor David Hogg. I'm sure he pines for the bygone era of Twitter. One when he could repeat whatever ridiculous talking point he thought of in his brain and have it go unchallenged. If anything, he would trend for it. Because the people who decided what was allowed to trend agreed with his ridiculousness.

The Hoggfather's (even though he promises never to have kids) latest thinkderp has to do with the Second Amendment and militias. Because THAT'S not one we've ever heard before. "You have no right to a gun. You are not a militia. When you’re talking about your second amendment rights you’re talking about a states right to have what is today the national guard. The modern interpretation of 2A is a ridiculous fraud pushed for decades by the gun lobby."

You have no right to a gun. You are not a militia. When you’re talking about your second amendment rights you’re talking about a states right to have what is today the national guard. The modern interpretation of 2A is a ridiculous fraud pushed for decades by the gun lobby.
— David Hogg ☮️ (@davidhogg111) February 26, 2023

Here comes Community Notes to the rescue:

Twitter users felt this context was necessary: "In the ruling for District of Columbia v. Heller, the court said that the right to bear arms was unconnected to service in a militia."

They even provided their sources by linking to the case which says, "Private citizens have the right under the Second Amendment to possess an ordinary type of weapon and use it for lawful, historically established situations such as self-defense in a home, even when there is no relationship to a local militia."

Having a level playing field is fun. Not so much for Davey boy. But it is for the rest of us tired of seeing how quick leftist disinformation is allowed to spread unfettered.

Editor’s Note

title: Watch: Joe Biden claims that even though he's a white boy "he's not stupid" and we beg to differ
description:
Joe Biden was celebrating Black History Month yesterday the best way he knows how. By insulting white people with a lame attempt at pandering humor. Also, with misinformation. While Joe Biden is in fact white, he isn't a boy. And while "independent" "fact" checkers will argue he's not stupid, critics would understandably disagree.

Biden: "I may be a white boy, but I'm not stupid." pic.twitter.com/45SmdcYTYn
— Greg Price (@greg_price11) February 27, 2023

Let's set aside there is a town full of rural whites in Ohio who would no doubt find this less funny that the rest of us. And let's set aside the shameless pandering by replacing his usual sign language girl.

If anything, Biden's failed attempt at humor shows progress. Usually, when the president questions the intelligence of an entire race of people, it's African-Americans.

Joe Biden doesn't think black people know how to choose extra legroom when they book an airline ticket (that he says they can't afford). He doesn't think black people know how to use condoms. He doesn't think black people have the intelligence to use the internet or hire a lawyer. And to further insult the intelligence of black Americans, he thinks they don't know that they are black Americans if they don't vote for him.

Though rest assured, Joe Biden believes that "poor" kids are just as smart as "white" kids. So at least there's that.

If anything, Joe Biden's comments show progress. After a lifetime of implying black Americans as stupid, Biden is now willing to say the whites are stupid as well. Yay equity!

title: Thug picks wrong cancer-stricken grandma to carjack, winds up in ambulance as grandma goes to chemo
description:
It takes a real scumbag to prey on an old woman. That's why the comeuppance is so much sweeter when a thug finds out the hard way he chose to wrong old broad to attack. One DC hoodlum found that out when he attacked "Grandma." Protip: when you target an old woman who is known as "Grandma" by any entire neighborhood, you're in trouble.

Worse, Grandma was on her way to chemo, as local Washington DC news reports.

“Next thing I know, he walked up talking about, 'give me your keys, I got a gun.' I said, 'baby, you better shoot me, because you’re not taking my car.'”

A fifteen-year-old was about to learn about the consequences of his actions. Also, be exposed as a pussy. You're young and fifteen. She's an elderly woman suffering from cancer. You're a big enough loser targeting the elderly. When you then fail to do so, you're a laughing stock among the other thugs and criminals.

Also, I think Grandma is my new hero:

"He pushed me to the door and I got up and I grabbed him and was hitting his ass, and hitting him and fighting him and I said, 'you not going to take my car, youngin.''

At this point, neighbors heard Grandma screaming. Again, this woman is known as "Grandma" to an entire neighborhood. That neighborhood chased the carjacker down.

Some details are missing in the story, such as what happened when he was caught. But according to the police report the scumbag left in an ambulance. I won't fault the neighbors being too busy jolly stomping this guy to think to record themselves doing so. It just would have been nice. You know, for content and posterity's sake.

The thug is in jail. Grandma made it to chemo and joins our list of bad-ass grannies teaching the youth how it's done.
